true.description: The boolean 'true' value for the asChild prop. Used to pass a child component to a parent component

false.description: The boolean 'true' value for the asChild prop. Used to pass a child component to a parent component

flex.description: Sets the Flex container to a block-level flex container.

inline-flex.description: Sets the Flex container to an inline-level flex container.

none.description: Sets the Flex container's 'display' property to 'none'.

row.description: Lays out the Flex items in a row.

column.description: Lays out the Flex items in a column.

row-reverse.description: Lays out the Flex items in a row in reverse order.

column-reverse.description: Lays out the Flex items in a column in reverse order.

start.description: Aligns Flex items at the start of the flex line.

center.description: Aligns Flex items at the center of the flex line.

end.description: Aligns Flex items at the end of the flex line.

baseline.description: Aligns Flex items along the baseline.

stretch.description: Stretches Flex items to fill the container.

start.description: Justifies Flex items at the start of the container.

center.description: Justifies Flex items at the center of the container.

end.description: Justifies Flex items at the end of the container.

between.description: Distributes Flex items evenly, with the first item at the start and the last item at the end.

wrap.description: Allows Flex items to wrap as needed.

wrap-reverse.description: Allows Flex items to wrap in reverse order.

0.description: Sets the space between flex items in the Flex Component. 0 * basePxUnit

1.description: Sets the space between flex items in the Flex Component. 1 * basePxUnit

2.description: Sets the space between flex items in the Flex Component. 2 * basePxUnit

3.description: Sets the space between flex items in the Flex Component. 3 * basePxUnit

4.description: Sets the space between flex items in the Flex Component. 4 * basePxUnit

px.description: A pixel-defined space between Flex items.

1,5.description: 1.5 times the base pixel value. Space between Flex items for fine-tuned layouts.

2,5.description: 2.5 times the base pixel value. Space between Flex items for fine-tuned layouts.

3,5.description: 3.5 times the base pixel value. Space between Flex items for fine-tuned layouts.
